name: Fashion City: World of Fashion
description:
Welcome to the Fashion City!
You're the young owner of the newest boutique in town. It's time you got those designer clothes arranged! Drag and drop the fancy clothes on the hangers, making them more visible to your future customers, then make sure the stylish shoes are nicely arranged on their shelves, more at hand for the shoe addicted that will enter your store and so on and so forth.

- Design your own boutique
- Unlock trendy designer clothes line
- Invite your friends to be your neighbors.
- FREE updates
- Send and receive gifts
